org.hps.conditions.api

Class ConditionsTagTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • junit.framework.Assert
      • junit.framework.TestCase
        • org.hps.conditions.api.ConditionsTagTest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    junit.framework.Test

    public class ConditionsTagTest
extends junit.framework.TestCase
    Get conditions from the database for a series of runs using a tag. Then check that the correct collection IDs were returned.
